products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Chic Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ecowood deluxe in chic grey fine grain brings an air of sophistication wherever it goes - or hangs. A deep shade of grey, it displays a classic wood grain works wonderfully on its faux wood slats. Linen ribbon tapes add a designer touch that just can't be beaten in terms of style. Opt for a bold look in your kitchen by pairing the chic grey fine grain with jet black and ruby red. Choose sleek black and grey units and worktops, adding in red in the form of utensils and crockery, and making silver your accent colour of choice.
